backend/main.mo: Actor with role-based access control, admin profile handling, and audio file upload/storage using blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a copy‑to‑clipboard student‑number feature to its related frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing key frontend files and components across the project.
frontend/ANDROID_WEBVIEW_SETUP.md: Guide explaining how to wrap the web app into an Android WebView APK using Android Studio.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with mobile WebView optimizations, meta tags, and privacy‑policy routing helper.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Web app manifest defining icons, colors, display mode, and startup settings for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app root managing routing via state, lazy loading, and permanent production query configuration.
frontend/src/components/activities/Anima: Animal matching game that randomizes pairs, tracks score and attempts, and provides feedback.
frontend/src/components/activities/Color: Color matching game with randomized palettes, sound effects, scoring, and feedback handling.
frontend/src/components/activities/Creat: Creative writing task generator that selects prompts and scores answers based on length and effort.
frontend/src/components/activities/Detai: Provides a timed spot-the-difference emoji game with dynamic grid sizes, randomized themes, and scoring based on correct selections.
frontend/src/components/activities/Logic: Generates repeating emoji pattern puzzles where players select the next item in the sequence, adjusting complexity by difficulty.
frontend/src/components/activities/MathG: Creates randomized math questions tailored to age group and difficulty, with multiple-choice answers and scoring.
frontend/src/components/activities/QuizG: Runs a multiple-choice knowledge quiz using a difficulty-based question bank with scoring and feedback.
frontend/src/components/activities/Shape: Implements a shape-matching game where players pair shapes from two lists, using randomized sets, colors, and difficulty-based counts.
frontend/src/components/activities/Simul: Interactive experiment mini-game that randomizes scenario parameters and calculates results and scores based on difficulty. Handles simulation state, scenario switching, and triggers completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/activities/WordG: Word-building game where students assemble shuffled syllables to form words based on difficulty. Manages rounds, scoring, feedback, and random word selection.
frontend/src/components/ActivityList.tsx: Component defining activity data by age group and difficulty, and rendering selectable activities.
frontend/src/components/ActivityPlayer.t: Renders and manages interactive activity games, tracking visits, scores, and achievements via localStorage with completion and replay handling.
frontend/src/components/DailyPlanning.ts: Displays and manages a daily planning calendar with CRUD operations for plans filtered by date using custom data hooks.
frontend/src/components/DersDisiGerecler: Provides tabbed UI for extra tools and cultural content, allowing navigation to planning or tools sections.
frontend/src/components/DifficultySelect: Shows selectable difficulty cards and triggers a callback with the chosen difficulty.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and opening the external privacy policy link.
Implements a large tab-based general knowledge module with nested categories, subcategories, content, and visuals.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays a fixed header with user avatar, score, and achievement data loaded from localStorage, adapting style on scroll.
frontend/src/components/Notebook.tsx: Interactive notebook component allowing users to create, view, edit, and delete notes with dialog-based forms.
frontend/src/components/PermissionDialog: Displays a themed permission request dialog with icons, descriptions, and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/ToolRouter.tsx: Lazy-loads and routes to various educational tool components based on a toolId value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Loads and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes. Invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and client creation. Exposes identity state and status flags to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Schedules motivational and bedtime notifications for a user when enabled. Uses the actor and browser Notification API with interval-based message dispatching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for sounds, audio files, and student data sync, using the backend actor. Handles CRUD operations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundEffects.ts: Loads and initializes various sound effects from backend files into the sound manager. Reactively updates loaded sounds when backend data changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, and responsive font/container rules.
frontend/src/lib/imageOptimizer.ts: Provides utilities for responsive images, preloading, dimension caching, and simple optimization logic.
frontend/src/lib/performanceMonitor.ts: Implements performance monitoring with observers, timing marks, memory checks, and a React hook for render timing.
frontend/src/lib/permissions.ts: Handles notification, camera, storage, and microphone permission requests with Android WebView detection and branded messages.
frontend/src/lib/soundManager.ts: Manages loading and playing categorized sound effects with a singleton sound manager and React hook.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Provides an admin interface for uploading, listing, previewing, and deleting categorized sound and audio files.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Provides a simple admin login form with local credential check and UI feedback.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarSelection.tsx: Allows students to select an avatar, enter a username, generate a student number, and save their profile locally and to backend.
frontend/src/pages/ClassView.tsx: Displays age‑group content, difficulty selection, and access to daily exams or activity lists.
frontend/src/pages/DailyExam.tsx: Generates age‑specific daily exams, tracks progress, handles timing, scoring, and saves results locally and via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/EntrySelection.tsx: Landing page offering selection between student login and parent/teacher login.
frontend/src/pages/InventorTools.tsx: Shows a selectable grid of utility tools (calculator, ruler, converter, etc.) for students with callbacks on selection.
frontend/src/pages/ParentTeacherDashboar: Dashboard for parents/teachers to search students by 16-digit number and view loading, error, or data states.
frontend/src/pages/PlanetSelection.tsx: Displays selectable age‑group planets and a tools section, greeting the user and triggering callbacks on selection.
frontend/src/pages/Planning.tsx: Provides planning tools with tabs for a notebook and daily planning, using stored student info and a close callback.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Shows the app’s privacy policy with sections on data use, permissions, and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettings.tsx: Allows editing profile info, avatar, and preferences, with save, copy, reset, and logout actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/tools/Calculator.tsx: Implements a basic calculator with arithmetic operations, percent, square root, and back navigation.
Provides a date difference and age calculator with input fields and computed results displayed in styled cards.
Implements a small bilingual dictionary with search, pronunciation, examples, voice input handling, and language selection.
frontend/src/pages/tools/EquationArea.ts: Lets users configure a linear equation ax + b = c and view step-by-step solution guidance with validation of their answer.
frontend/src/pages/tools/FormulaNotebook: Displays categorized formulas with search and favorites, rendered as cards across tabbed sections.
frontend/src/pages/tools/FractionTool.ts: Allows entering a fraction, computes simplification and percentage, and visualizes it via bar and pie models.
frontend/src/pages/tools/GraphCreator.ts: Interactive graph creator allowing users to add/remove data points and switch between bar and line charts using Recharts.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MultiplicationT: Displays a 10×10 multiplication table with optional answer hiding and cell highlight animation on click.
frontend/src/pages/tools/NoiseMeter.tsx: Microphone-based noise meter that analyzes audio levels in real time and categorizes them into predefined noise ranges with waveform visualization.
frontend/src/pages/tools/NumberLine.tsx: Interactive number line where users can move the pointer, zoom in/out, and visualize numeric positions dynamically.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PlaceValue.tsx: Breaks down a multi‑digit number into place values and visualizes each digit’s role with colored blocks and detailed calculations.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ProblemTemplate: Provides selectable math word problem templates, lets users adjust numbers, enter answers, and get correctness feedback with hints.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ReadingBar.tsx: Displays text with a movable highlight bar for focused reading, including font size control and editable input text.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RulerAngle.tsx: Offers draggable on-screen ruler and rotatable protractor tools using tabs for measurement interaction.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ScratchPad.tsx: Implements a drawable canvas with color palette, brush size, eraser, and clear functionality.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ShapeDrawing.ts: Lets users draw geometric shapes, customize size and color, and view calculated area and perimeter.
frontend/src/pages/tools/UnitConverter.t: Provides a unit conversion tool with category switching, temperature-specific logic, and UI controls for converting between units.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WritingTool.tsx: Implements a practice tool for Turkish letters and words, allowing users to type inputs and get correctness feedback.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared TypeScript types for age groups, user profiles, activities, plans, notes, and exam results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, issues, and upcoming requests related to i18n and a copy-to-clipboard feature.
